titleStmt.title: Virgidemiarum sixe bookes. First three bookes. Of tooth-lesse satyrs. 1. Poeticall. 2. Academicall. 3. Morall.
Virgidemiarum. Books 1-3
titleStmt.author: Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Harison, for Robert Dexter,

notesStmt.note: The numbered items are bracketed together on the title page.
Identified as part of STC 12719 on UMI microfilm reel 321.
Reproductions of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery (same copy filmed twice).
